Both clusters relate to the FitFusion Rebranding Project - initial kickoff and timeline, and subsequent tagline development. Combining them provides a complete project timeline.
Both clusters relate to the TechNova Product Launch - initial strategy and deadlines, and subsequent design development. Combining them provides a complete project timeline.
Both clusters relate to the GreenScape Sustainability Report - initial client collaboration and subsequent data visualization and design elements. Combining them provides a complete project timeline.

split_operations.reason: Large cluster (15 msgs) mixing initial planning and legal review with subsequent audience research. Splitting improves findability.

ai_operations.reasoning: Merged 5 clusters (EcoBloom, FitFusion, TechNova, GreenScape, UrbanEdge) to consolidate project timelines. Split one large cluster (TechNova) to separate planning and design phases. Result: 12 balanced clusters.
